response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant importance to me at a cost of $10,000. However, considering its potential worth to you, I'm willing to extend this opportunity at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a unique chance to acquire such a valuable asset at a slightly reduced rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 9500}
